Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Length of a sprint in days

Name: Number of Features
Description: Number of features assigned to a sprint

Name: Task Effort Estimate
Description: Estimated effort per task (story points or hours)

Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members in a team

Name: Blocker Count
Description: Number of active blockers affecting a sprint

Name: Velocity
Description: Average story points completed per sprint

Name: Skill Level
Description: Level of a skill for an employee
